message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but I can't let this go for less than $15,000. This is already a significant discount from my initial asking price.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and I appreciate the discount. However, I am still unable to meet your price. I would like to counteroffer at $14,000 for the product.
